attributes.action: Reduce tax on fuel by reducing VAT & freezing it when price goes over $x pb.
attributes.additional_details:
Fuel prices are now a daily issue. Local stations have risen from £1.40pl to now 1.98 pl. 

VAT charged on every element of fuel including fuel duty. So we pay tax on tax. Fuel duty is flat at 57.95p with VAT being charged on that and So we pay 11.5p tax on tax. Why not exclude vat being charged on fuel duty AND CAP the VAT limit that can be charged on fuel.
attributes.background: At present everyday life is being killed by the raise in fuel costs. However VAT blindly follows the barrel price and fuel tax  This helps the govt by a reasonable tax now becoming an over tax.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions which call for very similar actions:

Suspend VAT on road fuels to reduce fuel costs: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/610567

Halve fuel duty and remove VAT on fuel prices: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/618421

We could accept a petition calling on the Government to cap the amount of VAT that is charged on fuel, but you'd need to be clear what you wanted this cap to be.
